SELECT PROD_PLN_CD, ITEM_CD, ITEM_NM, PROD_STRT_DT, PROD_END_DT, TRG_PROD_CNT FROM TB_PR_1110MT WHERE PROD_STRT_DT >= TO_DATE(#{searchStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND PROD_END_DT <= TO_DATE(#{searchEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY PROD_STRT_DT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PR_1100MT ( PROD_CD, MT_MNG_CD, LIUN_NM, ITEM_NM, ITEM_CD, PROD_STRT_TIME, PROD_END_TIME, INDC_QNTT, PROD_QNTT, WORK_NM, EQPM_OPRT_STTS_VAL, PROD_END_YN, DFC_RT ) VALUES ( #{prod_cd}, #{mt_mng_cd}, #{liun_nm}, #{item_nm}, #{item_cd}, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' + INTERVAL '9' HOUR, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss'), '00:00:00', #{indc_qntt}, #{prod_qntt}, #{work_nm}, 'Y', 'N', NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_PR_1100MT SET MT_MNG_CD = #{mt_mng_cd}, LIUN_NM = #{liun_nm}, ITEM_NM = #{item_nm}, ITEM_CD = #{item_cd}, PROD_STRT_TIME = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' + INTERVAL '9' HOUR, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss'), PROD_END_TIME = '00:00:00', INDC_QNTT = #{indc_qntt}, PROD_QNTT = #{prod_qntt}, WORK_NM = #{work_nm}, EQPM_OPRT_STTS_VAL = 'Y', PROD_END_YN = 'N', DFC_RT = #{dfc_rt} WHERE PROD_CD = #{prod_cd}

UPDATE TB_PR_1100MT SET PROD_END_TIME = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' + INTERVAL '9' HOUR, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss'), EQPM_OPRT_STTS_VAL = 'N', PROD_END_YN = 'Y', DFC_RT = #{dfc_rt} WHERE PROD_CD = #{prod_cd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PR_1110MT ( PROD_PLN_CD, ITEM_NM, TRG_PROD_CNT, PROD_STRT_DT, PROD_END_DT, ITEM_CD, PROD_END_COB ) VALUES ( 'PR_' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yymm') || '_' || LPAD(SQ_PR_1110MT.NEXTVAL, 4, '0'), #{item_nm}, #{trg_prod_cnt}, #{prod_strt_dt}, #{prod_end_dt}, #{item_cd}, 'N' )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_PR_1110MT SET ITEM_NM = #{item_nm}, TRG_PROD_CNT = #{trg_prod_cnt}, PROD_STRT_DT =#{prod_strt_dt}, PROD_END_DT = #{prod_end_dt}, ITEM_CD = #{item_cd} WHERE PROD_PLN_CD = #{prod_pln_cd}
UPDATE TB_PR_1110MT SET PROD_END_COB = 'Y' WHERE PROD_PLN_CD = #{prod_pln_cd}
